eventInfo.name: Donegal International Rally
eventInfo.subtitle: Donegal has it all!
description: The Donegal International Rally is Ireland's premier rally event and one of the most challenging and prestigious rallies in Europe. First held in 1972, it has grown to become a three-day spectacular that attracts the best drivers from Ireland, the UK, and beyond.

Known for its fast, flowing stages through the stunning Donegal countryside, the rally tests both driver skill and mechanical reliability. The rally attracts in excess of 70,000 spectators with close to 400,000 viewers on TV and online.

organizer.name: Donegal Motor Club
organizer.description: The Donegal Motor Club, founded in 1969, is the organizing body behind the Donegal International Rally. With over 50 years of motorsport experience, the club has established itself as one of Ireland's premier rally organizing teams.
